body.name: Bamboo Pocket Tissues, 4-Ply, Unbleached, 10 Pack (8 Tissues per Pack, 80 Tissues Total), Eco-Friendly, Travel Facial Tissues, Tree-Free, Plant Based, Vegan, Hypoallergenic, Sustainable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: TREE-FREE & BIODEGRADABLE. Terre pocket tissues are made from 100% virgin bamboo pulp. Bamboo is the largest, fastest, growing species of grass, a renewable resource that helps protect the environment giving you a sustainable and eco-friendly alternative to traditional tree-based facial tissues.

HYPOALLERGENIC & BPA-FREE. Our pocket tissues are sourced from bamboo that is free of additives and is hypoallergenic. Perfect for people with asthma, allergies, sinus infections, sensitive noses, and skin. Baby and kid friendly.

CONVENIENT & ON-THE-GO. Individual mini packs, great for everyone for any occasion - travel, camping, hiking, weddings, graduations, baby showers, festivals, nights out, and walks with your pets. Perfect for use at school, in the car, at the beach, park, or at the office.

BLEACH-FREE & TOXIN-FREE. The most sustainable pocket tissues with a natural light brown bamboo color - unbleached and Totally Chlorine Free. No ECF chemical bleaching (used to make paper white & fluffy). Bleach-Free, Formaldehyde-Free, Dye-Free, Fragrance-Free, Alcohol-Free, Paraben-Free, Gelatin-Free, Collagen-Free. Vegan and Cruelty-Free.
TOTAL OF 10 POCKET PACKS. 8 4-ply tissues per pack, 80 sheets total of environmentally friendly 100% bamboo facial tissues. Soft, strong, absorbent, and lint free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tissues Made From Eco-Friendly Bamboo!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these pocket tissues made from bamboo, and I am extremely happy with my purchase. As someone who is environmentally conscious, I love that these tissues are made from bamboo, a sustainable and renewable resource.The tissues themselves are soft and durable, and they don't irritate my sensitive skin like some other tissues do. They're also very convenient to carry around in my purse or pocket for whenever I need them.I appreciate that the packaging is also eco-friendly and minimalistic, with no unnecessary plastic or excess materials.Overall, I highly recommend these bamboo pocket tissues to anyone who wants to make a positive impact on the environment while still enjoying a quality product. Five stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nasty chemicals free!
reviews.reviewText: I don't need chlorine and whole bunch of chemicals to treat my nose or eyes. Like paper tissue from other brands contains. Just bamboo, soft, gentle and natural. Small friendly pack that fits anywhere. Tried many other brands but what sets this product apart is a quality and value that makes a difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bamboo Tissues
reviews.reviewText: These are awesome!They're non-scented and environmentally friendly but still very thick (4 ply), soft, and absorbent!Each package is the perfect size to throw into your bag, your car, desk, or anywhere else!I will definitely order these again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent product.
reviews.reviewText: These tissues are as soft and absorbent as one could want, and have strength to stand up to sneezing. It’s a great bonus that they are a sustainable product that does not add unnecessary and harmful chemicals to the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent little purse/travel friendly packs. They're surprisingly thicker than other brands. Works for it's intended purposes. I would buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s like blowing your nose on a literal napkin
reviews.reviewText: I love how the product is free of chemicals and unbleached, but def not for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Natural paper that is thick. One tissue can be split into two to be used. Good quality tissues but mid-quality on the packaging so make sure to use the entire pack when you open one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not super soft
reviews.reviewText: My son won’t let me use these to wipe his nose. They are too rough. Super compact but irritating if you have to use them more than once a day
